title: Scotch broth
description: This cheap and cheerful soup is perfect for the slow cooker - simply tip in all the ingredients and cook on high for 6-8 hours (or until the barley is soft).

default: 125g/4oz dried peas, soaked in water for 4-5 hours, drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat all of the ingredients, except the kale, in a large saucepan until boiling.
Reduce the heat and simmer gently for a 2-3 hours, or until the peas and pearl barley are soft.
Stir in the kale and cook for a further 10-12 minutes, or until the kale is tender. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
